synonyms: prabhu kahena—the Lord replied; kṛṣṇa-sevā—serving Kṛṣṇa; vaiṣṇava-sevana—abiding by the orders of Vaiṣṇavas; nirantara—without cessation; kara—do; kṛṣṇa-nāma-saṅkīrtana—chanting of the holy name of Lord Kṛṣṇa.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu replied, "Without cessation continue chanting the holy name of Lord Kṛṣṇa. Whenever possible, serve Him and His devotees, the Vaiṣṇavas."
